Message.Title: Portugal
Message.Msg: Standard & Poor's Ratings Services on Friday cut its outlook on Portugal's credit rating to negative from stable, citing complications to the country's "already-challenging policy-making environment" following the resignations this week of two key government ministers.

Message.Title: CAT
Message.Msg: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) is acquiring Johan Walter Berg AB, a Sweden-based leading manufacturer of propulsion systems and marine controls for ships.

Message.Title: LULU
Message.Msg: Lululemon Founder to Sell More Than $200 Million in Stock

Message.Title: ZNGA
Message.Msg: Mattrick's base salary will clock in at just $1 million, but his 2013 guaranteed minimum bonus will be either $2 million or the average percentage bonus of Zynga's other executive officers applied to his base salary, whichever is largest, with the bonus pro-rated for how many days he is on board in the fiscal year, which ends Dec. 30.

Message.Title: ORCL
